unnormalised: Builder Reviews: Are You Doing Your Homework Before Buying that 'Sapnon Ka Ghar'?
normalised: Builder Reviews: Are You Doing Your Homework Before Buying that 'Sapnon Ka Ghar'?

unnormalised: Buying property is a big deal, especially in Mumbai! Forget chasing Katrina Kaif for your dream home; first, chase down genuine builder reviews! No one wants to end up with a 'Ghar Ho Toh Aisa' gone wrong, right?
normalised: Buying property is a big deal, especially in Mumbai! Forget chasing Katrina Kaif for your dream home; first, chase down genuine builder reviews! No one wants to end up with a 'Ghar Ho Toh Aisa' gone wrong, right?

unnormalised: Forget blindly trusting brochures; check out online platforms buzzing with feedback from actual buyers. Think of it as your online 'parchi' – insider info before committing to that 2BHK in Borivali.
normalised: Forget blindly trusting brochures; check out online platforms buzzing with feedback from actual buyers. Think of it as your online 'parchi' – insider info before committing to that two B H K in Borivali.

unnormalised: Is the builder actually delivering on time? Are the hidden costs more than your monthly 'kirana' budget? Don't be a 'bechara' – read the reviews!
normalised: Is the builder actually delivering on time? Are the hidden costs more than your monthly 'kirana' budget? Don't be a 'bechara' – read the reviews!

unnormalised: Sites like Housing.com and Magicbricks are your friend. Look for consistent complaints or praises. Did Mr. Sharma have a nightmare experience with delayed possession in his Thane flat? Did Mrs. Iyer rave about the customer service at a project near IIT Bombay?
normalised: Sites like Housing dot com and Magicbricks are your friend. Look for consistent complaints or praises. Did Mister Sharma have a nightmare experience with delayed possession in his Thane flat? Did Missus Iyer rave about the customer service at a project near I I T Bombay?

unnormalised: Remember, due diligence is key. A little research can save you a lot of heartache (and Rs. lakhs!). Don't just rely on what your 'rishtedar' says. Get the real scoop!
normalised: Remember, due diligence is key. A little research can save you a lot of heartache (and rupees lakhs!). Don't just rely on what your 'rishtedar' says. Get the real scoop!
